```{r count_v_date}
ggplot(socrata) + aes(x = createdAt, y = viewCount, color = portal) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_x_date('Dataset creation date') +
  scale_y_log10('Dataset view count')
```

```{r ncol}
ggplot(subset(melt(socrata), strtrim(variable, 5) == 'ncol.')) + aes(group = paste(portal, id), y = variable, x = value, color = portal) + geom_path()
```
